content: using that same cc yarn work one row of double_crochet all the way around the on one side of your blanket blanket border remembering to work foundation row 3dc in each corner st and cont using cc chain 141 crocheting any loose ends into your border copyright 2024 the autumn acorn pattern is intended for personal use only other uses are 2 strictly prohibited all rights reserved finishing you can also find me on ig as @theautumnacorn block your blanket by soaking in please tag me in your progress warm water and mild soap and then photos with @theautumnacorn and lying flat to dry once dry snip off all using hashtag yarn ends that you couldn t weave in #doublecrochetscrappyblanket final notes i have a blog at a huge thank you to everyone who www theautumnacorn com and an has helped make this pattern possible etsy shop called the autumn acorn for more of my pattern designs http //www theautumnacorn com or finally don t forget to check out my http //www ravelry com/designers/t knitting and crocheting podcast on he-autumn-acorn youtube called the autumn acorn knits any my new asmr if you have any questions about this channel the autumn acorn pattern please email me at asmr judy@theautumnacorn com can t wait to connect with you judy copyright 2024 the autumn acorn pattern is intended for personal use only other uses are 3 strictly prohibited all rights reserved notes copyright 2024 the autumn acorn pattern is intended for personal use only other uses are 4 strictly prohibited all rights reserved
